response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its exceptional value, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $200. This is a chance to secure a high-quality item at a premium price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 200}
